caption.p: Changes in total phenolic content of cocoa beans during processing [DCB = Oven dried cocoa beans; DTRCB 5 min = Dried and traditionally roasted cocoa beans (5 min); DORCB 5 min = Dried and oven roasted cocoa beans (5 min); DTRCB 10 min = Dried and traditionally roasted cocoa beans (10 min); DORCB 10 min = Dried and oven roasted cocoa beans (10 min)].
